pr_title: use actual GitHub path as testparam path, don't use /test.json by default

timeline.message: use actual GitHub path as testparam path, don't use test.json by default

timeline.bodyText:
It was like this, but I think you could move this to before line 739, saving the unnecessary reading of the GitHub file and creation of a SourceFile if there actually is a duplicate.
Performance-wise, I'm sure it's negligible, and I doubt there are rarely, if ever, any cases of duplicate files like this, but it might make the code slightly easier to read.
Just nit-picking, and I don't feel super-strongly about this, but just noticed it as I was trying to understand the code.
timeline.author: coverbeck

timeline.message: test .dockstore.yml workflow test param file path
check for duplicate path before reading file from repo

timeline.bodyText:
Would also like a test for a Galaxy workflow with a yaml test parameter file to cover our bases
Edit: can see from above, this is unlikely to catch anything, but just in case
timeline.author: denis-yuen
